title: worlds missions
body: Hello, i have done a couple of games with with the missions unlocked but i am receiving no progress on them, i know there was a "!" on the client about it not tracking properly but i have not heard of a fix for this yet. Does anyone know if there is? that would greatly appreciated! Thanks.

replies.body: Keep in mind that you need to have one of the Worlds icons equipped for those missions to track your progress. It looks like you've got Multi equipped right now, so so make sure to change it to progress.
